name: Al Jaleel
description: Al Jaleel is one of the names of Allah in Islam, meaning 'The Majestic' or 'The Glorious'. It signifies the immense greatness and dignity of Allah.
summary: The name Al Jaleel emphasizes Allah's majesty and grandeur, reflecting His supreme authority and the awe-inspiring nature of His creation. It reminds believers of the reverence due to Allah and the beauty in His divine attributes. The name is derived from the Arabic root 'jalal', which relates to honor and magnificence.
